title: On the Crest of Time : A Historical Romance, Circa 1990
description: Camera-maker Andre Optic improvises across the web of time that enmeshes Sara Berlin, a student astro-chemist. In love, blindly seeking sight, enticed by the challenge of each other, Sara and Andre travel from the hills of San Francisco, under the dream cliffs inside themselves, across an ever-evolving Europe, to a radioactive ledge in the Southwest, to leave us guessing at their fate, knowingly...a smart romance, seductively funny, politically intriguing.
author: X.Y. Zebra
